targets.expr:
# Query C: sum ingestion errors by file_type
sum by(file_type) (max_over_time(google_drive_ingestion_errors_total[$__range]))

# Query D: sum EXTRACTED files by file_type
sum by(file_type) ( max_over_time(google_drive_files_extracted_total[$__range]))

# Query B: sum blocked files by file_type
sum by(file_type) (max_over_time(google_drive_blocked_files_total[$__range]))

# Query E: sum EXTRACTED ERROR files by file_type
sum by(file_type) ( max_over_time(google_drive_file_extraction_errors_total[$__range]))
